import React from 'react' import {Link,} from 'react-router-dom' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const Card = (props) => { const numberwithCommas = (x) => { return x.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ","); }; return (

{props.title}

{props.address},{props.city},{props.state}

Price : {numberwithCommas(props.price)}

Bedrooms : {props.bedrooms}

Bathrooms : {props.bathrooms}

{props.sale_type}

{props.home_type}

Sqft : {props.sqft}

View Listing
) } Card.propTypes = { title: PropTypes.string.isRequired, photo_main: PropTypes.string.isRequired, address: PropTypes.string.isRequired, city: PropTypes.string.isRequired, state: PropTypes.string.isRequired, price: PropTypes.number.isRequired, bedrooms: PropTypes.number.isRequired, bathrooms: PropTypes.number.isRequired, home_type: PropTypes.string.isRequired, sale_type: PropTypes.string.isRequired, sqft: PropTypes.number.isRequired, slug: PropTypes.string.isRequired, } export default Card
